doc:
Donald Hewlett https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Hewlett 0 Donald Hewlett (30 August 1920 – 4 June 2011) was an English actor, born in Northenden, Manchester, Lancashire, and best known for his sitcom roles as Colonel Charles Reynolds in It Ain't Half Hot Mum and Lord Meldrum in You Rang, M'Lord?, both written by Jimmy Perry and David Croft. He also had a number of parts in British film and television productions. Donald_Hewlett ( 30_August_1920 – 4_June_2011 ) was an_English_actor , born in Northenden , Manchester , Lancashire , and best_known for his_sitcom_roles as Colonel_Charles_Reynolds in It Ai n't Half_Hot_Mum and Lord_Meldrum in You Rang , M'Lord ? , both written by Jimmy_Perry and David_Croft . He also had a_number of parts in British_film_and_television_productions .
